tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Ambardekar is very experience doctor, he introgate patient and listen to all the details / issue of ailments. He is very friendly in discussion which open up the patient to reveal all details, which is very rare in this times. The medicine he prescribed also mentioned about brand as well as generic names so it is sometimes cost effective also. I visited dr. for my father and we are fully satisfied with his treatment. He also gave moral boost and confidence required for patient post hospitalization, and inject "can do" attitude in patient. A big thank you to the Doctor Ambardekar.
The doctor helped my mom with her issues and was very patient in explaining everything. Highly recommended
Very friendly doctor. He explains things in detail but in a language that any lay man will also understand.
